definition: site name + number (If there is only one water access point at a site, there will be no number. For example, Mbane is not Mbane 1, but Merina Gewel is Merina Gewel 1, 2, 3, and 4.)
number of field mission (1 = May/June 2016, 2 = Aug/Sep 2016, 3 = Jan 2017, 4 = May/June 2017, 5 = Jul/Aug 2017, 6 = Jan 2018)
number of quadrats sampled at that site-date combination
total area sampled (area of quadrat * number of quadrats) at that site-date combination
number of snail clusters detected by SatScan analysis at that site-date combination
total area of the site in m2; this area can vary within a site across time due to temporal fluctuations in water level.
site name + number with no spaces
percent of site area covered by non-emergent vegetation
area of site covered by non-emergent vegetation in m2
